channel.title: Moja Global on Ankita Sharma
channel.description: Recent content in Moja Global on Ankita Sharma

item.title: MongoDB vs CosmosDB
item.description: As an outreachy intern at Moja Global, I was involved in discussions about storing data in CosmosDB and MongoDB. This blog contains my notes on the comparison of MongoDB and CosmosDB. A lot of this is written in terms of how a database server can be useful for my work at Moja Global. Factors affecting the choice Better choice as document storage. Type of data that needs to be stored.

item.title: Outreachy | Introduce Yourself
item.description: This is my first blog in the series where I talk about my experience as an intern at Outreachy, and working with the Moja Global community! I’m more than excited to share how things go as i move along, and I hope to continue writing these blogs weekly. In this blog, I will be talking about myself and the core values that helped me throughout the journey. Who Am I?
